name: Goblin King
description:
Goblin king is a goblin rts where you as the newly appointed goblin king must guide your goblin kin to victory against the ruthless filthy humans.

Be sure to play fullscreen!

Game was made in 48hrs for #MizJam1

Tutorial mode in offline windows version!

Mouse control only

Left Click selects your king goblin.

Right click calls your goblin army to you (Use it if you want to pull your goblins away from a task such as figthing, harvesting, raiding.)

Made by Kal O'Brien / Twitter @kalobrienz

Art assets by Kenney

Audio sourced from OpenGameArt
